amendment.description: Amendment sought to delete $666 million in discretionary mass transit grants for 30 new fixed guideways systems.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 12 in the Congressional Record of July 19, 1995, to eliminate the $666 million in funds appropriated for mass transit grants for 30 new light rail mass transit projects.

action.text: Mr. Menendez raised a point of order against the Smith (MI) amendment (A004). Point of order overruled by the Chair.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Smith (MI) amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 114 - 302 (Roll no. 560).
